p: The nanoporous structure of BC and its high swelling ability allows not only to saturate and release drugs, but also serves as an efficient physical barrier sequestrating the microbes within. It was shown that dry BC was able to absorb 0.98–1.03 µL of oils/mg of dry BC (Fig. 2a). No significant differences between individual EOs absorbed volume were observed (K-W test, p < 0.05).
